item.title: Front-Office Benchmark
item.description: How to benchmark your PrestaShop Shop (Front-office) Benchmark methodology In order to benchmark the performances of your shop, you will use the siege testing tool. Try to always use the latest available version HERE. item.title: Back-Office Benchmark
item.description: How to benchmark your PrestaShop Shop (Back-office) Benchmark methodology In order to benchmark the performances of the backoffice of your shop, you will use the Gatling testing tool. Note: Backoffice benchmark is only possible starting with prestashop 1.7.4.0! If you want still want to run the test for version < 1.7.4.0, take a look at this PR: https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/pull/8876 What is Gatling? Gatling is a stress tool. Development is currently focusing on HTTP support.
